mapper.select: select orgnz_no orgnzNo, orgnz_nm orgnzNm, ENG_ORGNZ_NM engOrgnzNm, ORGNZ_DSTNCT orgnzDstnct, HMPAGE_URL hmpageUrl, TEL_NO telNo, FAX_NO faxNo, ADDR addr, DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr, PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO prntsOrgnzNo, orgnz_full_nm orgnzFullNm, MAP_PROF_NM mapProfNm, LAB_INTRO labIntro, RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT rsrchrInfoText, HMNBRD_DSTNCT hmnbrdDstnct from organz where ORGNZ_DSTNCT=#{type} and orgnz_no = #{no}

select o1.orgnz_no orgnzNo, o1.orgnz_nm orgnzNm, o1.ENG_ORGNZ_NM engOrgnzNm, o1.ORGNZ_DSTNCT orgnzDstnct, o1.HMPAGE_URL hmpageUrl, o1.TEL_NO telNo, o1.FAX_NO faxNo, o1.ADDR addr, o1.DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr, o1.PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO prntsOrgnzNo, o2.orgnz_full_nm orgnzFullNm, o1.MAP_PROF_NM mapProfNm, o1.LAB_INTRO labIntro, o1.RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT rsrchrInfoText, o1.HMNBRD_DSTNCT hmnbrdDstnct from organz o1, organz o2 where o1.ORGNZ_DSTNCT=#{type} and o1.orgnz_no = #{no} and o1.PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO=o2.orgnz_no

select o1.orgnz_no orgnzNo, o1.orgnz_nm orgnzNm, o1.ENG_ORGNZ_NM engOrgnzNm, o1.ORGNZ_DSTNCT orgnzDstnct, o1.HMPAGE_URL hmpageUrl, o1.TEL_NO telNo, o1.FAX_NO faxNo, o1.ADDR addr, o1.DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr, o1.PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO prntsOrgnzNo, o1.MAP_PROF_NM mapProfNm, o1.LAB_INTRO labIntro, o1.RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT rsrchrInfoText, o1.HMNBRD_DSTNCT hmnbrdDstnct, o2.orgnz_full_nm orgnzFullNm from organz o1, organz o2 where o1.ORGNZ_DSTNCT='연구실' and o1.orgnz_no = #{no} and o1.PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO=o2.orgnz_no

select orgnz_no orgnzNo, orgnz_nm orgnzNm, ENG_ORGNZ_NM engOrgnzNm, ORGNZ_DSTNCT orgnzDstnct, HMPAGE_URL hmpageUrl,TEL_NO telNo, FAX_NO faxNo, ADDR addr, DETAIL_ADDR detailAddr, PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO prntsOrgnzNo, MAP_PROF_NM mapProfNm, LAB_INTRO labIntro, RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT rsrchrInfoText, HMNBRD_DSTNCT hmnbrdDstnct, orgnz_full_nm orgnzFullNm from organz where ORGNZ_DSTNCT='연구실'
mapper.insert: insert into organz (ORGNZ_NO, ORGNZ_NM, ENG_ORGNZ_NM, ORGNZ_DSTNCT, HMPAGE_URL, TEL_NO, FAX_NO, ADDR, DETAIL_ADDR, PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO, MAP_PROF_NM, LAB_INTRO, RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT, HMNBRD_DSTNCT, orgnz_full_nm) values (null, #{orgnzNm}, #{engOrgnzNm}, #{orgnzDstnct},#{hmpageUrl},#{telNo },#{faxNo},#{addr},#{detailAddr},#{prntsOrgnzNo},#{mapProfNm},#{labIntro},#{rsrchrInfoText},#{hmnbrdDstnct},concat(#{orgnzFullNm},' ',#{orgnzNm}))
insert into resrch_acrslt (RESRCH_ACRSLT_NO, ORGNZ_NO, ACRSLT_DSTNCT, REGST_DT, RESRCH_YYCL, RESRCH_TEXT ) values (null, #{orgnzNo}, #{acrsltDstnct}, now() ,#{resrchYycl},#{resrchText})
mapper.update: update organz set orgnz_nm=#{orgnzNm},ENG_ORGNZ_NM=#{engOrgnzNm}, ORGNZ_DSTNCT=#{orgnzDstnct}, HMPAGE_URL=#{hmpageUrl}, TEL_NO=#{telNo}, FAX_NO=#{faxNo}, ADDR=#{addr}, DETAIL_ADDR=#{detailAddr}, PRNTS_ORGNZ_NO=#{prntsOrgnzNo}, MAP_PROF_NM=#{mapProfNm}, LAB_INTRO=#{labIntro}, RSRCHR_INFO_TEXT=#{rsrchrInfoText}, HMNBRD_DSTNCT=#{hmnbrdDstnct}, ORGNZ_FULL_NM=concat(#{orgnzFullNm},' ',#{orgnzNm}) where orgnz_no=#{orgnzNo}
mapper.select: select orgnz_no orgnzNo, orgnz_full_nm orgnzNm, orgnz_dstnct orgnzDstnct from organz where orgnz_full_nm like '%${stext }%' and ORGNZ_DSTNCT = #{type }
select orgnz_no orgnzNo, orgnz_full_nm orgnzNm, orgnz_dstnct orgnzDstnct from organz where orgnz_full_nm like '%${stext }%' and (orgnz_dstnct=#{type } or orgnz_dstnct=#{type2 })
